sentences.sContent: The murderer was traced to Paris.
sentences.sCn: 那个凶手被追踪到巴黎。

sentences.sContent: The telegram will intercep him at Paris.
sentences.sContent_eng: The telegram will intercep him at Paris.
sentences.sCn: 这封电报将把他截在巴黎。

sentences.sContent: We have to change for Paris at this station.
sentences.sContent_eng: We have to change for Paris at this station.
sentences.sCn: 我们必须在这个车站换车去巴黎。
